featured_reviews.review_id: Nichola was my physiotherapist after my car accident, and I cannot express enough how important she was to my recovery. Having an in-home therapist was incredibly helpful, and she was cheerful, intelligent, and overall a great therapist. These 5 star ratings are all well-earned. Highly recommended!
featured_reviews.review_text: Nichola was my physiotherapist after my car accident, and I cannot express enough how important she was to my recovery. Having an in-home therapist was incredibly helpful, and she was cheerful, intelligent, and overall a great therapist. These 5 star ratings are all well-earned. Highly recommended!

featured_reviews.review_id: I was recently injured in a head on car collision and the damage to my IT Band and left hip joint was so severe I could not walk (my left leg could not support my weight and the pain was excruciating). My lawyer put me in touch with Nichola who came to my home, which was so appreciated and Nichola took care of direct billing ICBC. Nichola has it all. Nichola was excellent at diagnosing my issues (she is a terrific listener) and when it came to doing her magic, each session made significant steps in easing my pains so that I was soon able to walk again. If you are looking for a physiotherapist I recommend you check out Nichola. She's awesome.

featured_reviews.review_id: Nichola is the most effective Physio I have ever been treated by.  She treated chronic pain in my neck and after minimal treatments my pain decreased, and my mobility was back to normal.  I highly recommend her for long term pain, quick tune-ups, and anything else that is bother you.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Clover Physio has a handy mobile practice that really helps with my busy schedule.

Nichola has a calm and conversational manner that really puts me at ease, as my injuries aren't the easiest to work with! She has an array of treatments available - IMS, Massage, Exercises. I always feel better once she's seen me.

featured_reviews.review_id: Nichola at Clover Physio came directly to my house in Burnaby. I had recently injured myself in a car accident and she dealt with all the ICBC billing with no extra charge to me. I have made a great recovery with the help and guidance from Nichola. The fact she came to my house made such a big difference and she was so kind and helpfull. I would highly recommend Nichola.

featured_reviews.review_id: I attended Nichola with a pain in my lower back recently and have to say that I was so happy with the service I got at Clover Physio. Nichola was not only very professional but also such a lovely person to work with. I honestly cannot say enough of good things about Nichola and her team. Thanks Nichola for everything xx

featured_reviews.review_id: Nichola is kind-hearted, very knowledgeable and can identify the root cause of the problem. She takes her time and knows a lot of techniques that have helped with the healing process of a knee surgery. Definitely recommend Nichola!

featured_reviews.review_id: I went to see Nichola for my neck pain. It was amazing how she knew exactly where the cause of the pain was coming from. She really knows her stuff. After 2 sessions I was pain free. Highly recommend
